meanings.definition: Capable of being rated or assessed for taxation.
meanings.sent1: The house was considered ratables by the tax assessor.
meanings.sent2: The ratables properties were carefully evaluated by the government.
meanings.sent3: The ratables car seemed to wink at the tax collector.
meanings.sent4: Her ratables smile brightened up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The idea of ratables items made her feel secure about her finances.

meanings.definition: Items or properties subject to taxation.
meanings.sent1: The city council discussed the ratables in the upcoming budget.
meanings.sent2: The ratables included houses, cars, and businesses.
meanings.sent3: The ratables on the street seemed to gossip about the tax increase.
meanings.sent4: His collection of ratables was like a treasure trove for the tax department.
meanings.sent5: The warehouse was full of ratables waiting to be taxed.
